org.trianacode.gui.hci

Interface ToolFilter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AllPackagesFilter, AllToolsFilter, DataTypeFilter, InputToolsFilter, OutputToolsFilter, SearchFilter, SubPackageFilter, ToolboxFilter, WorkflowFilter

    public interface ToolFilter
    An interface implemented by classes that map between tools and tool tree locations

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_ROOT 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      This method is called when the filter is unchoosen.
      java.lang.String[] getFilteredPackage(Tool tool) 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      java.lang.String getRoot() 
      void init()
      This method is called when the filter is choosen.

    • Field Detail

      • DEFAULT_ROOT

        static final java.lang.String DEFAULT_ROOT
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the name of this filter

      • getRoot

        java.lang.String getRoot()
        Returns:
        the root for the tool tree

      • getFilteredPackage

        java.lang.String[] getFilteredPackage(Tool tool)
        Returns:
        the filtered packages for the tool, empty array if the tool is ignored. (e.g. a tool in SignalPro.Input could become Input.SignalProc)

      • init

        void init()
        This method is called when the filter is choosen. The initialisation of the filter should be implemented here

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        This method is called when the filter is unchoosen. Any disposal related to the filter should be implemented here
